page.title: 03Changing Times
page.content: Two people were interviewed about how life has changed over the last 50 years in North Radcliffe.We discovered that Radcliffe used to be a thriving { {spinning}and {weaving}community with several{coal mines. }Both these industries have disappeared. The little industry that is left is{light {manufacturing.}In the past most people worked close to home,but now most people have to travel outside the area to work.{School}life has also seen many changes.The curriculum includes many more interesting subjects these days.Most families in our area have at least one car.Gone are the trams and extensive{railway {networks.}There used to be two stations,now there are none.The landscape has changed over the past 50 years as several new housing estates have been built.
